data_table.description: Health/Medical History, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HHXD1
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. Did the participant report positive Rose angina in the Annual Follow-up call preceding this visit? Q1 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2A
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Sternum (upper or middle). Q2a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2B
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Sternum (lower) Q2b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2C
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Left anterior chest Q2c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2D
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Left arm Q2d [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD2E
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the ARIC telephone call you mentioned having some pain or discomfort in your chest in the past year. Could you tell me where it was? Q2. Other Q2e [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD3
variable.description: [AFU chest pain confirmation]. In the past two months has your chest discomfort either occurred more often, lasted longer when it occurs, or come on at rest? Q3 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD4
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you had surgery on your heart, or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? Q4 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: coronary bypass: Q5a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: other heart procedure: Q5b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: carotid endarterectomy: Q5c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5D
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: site: Q5d [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5E
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: other arterial revascularization: Q5e [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD5F
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Any other type of surgery on your heart or the arteries of your neck or legs? Q5f [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD6
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? Q6 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD7A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: angioplasty of the coronary arteries: Q7a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD7B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: angioplasty in the arteries of your neck: Q7b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD7C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have: angioplasty of lower extremity arteries: Q7c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD8A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic have you had: heart catheterization: Q8a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD8B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic have you had: carotid artery catheterization: Q8b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD8C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic have you had: other arterial catheterization: Q8c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9A
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Echocardiogram: Q9a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9B
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Electrocardiogram: Q9b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9C
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Treadmill or cardiac stress test: Q9c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9D
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Thallium scan of the heart: Q9d [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9E
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Holter monitor: Q9e [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9F
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Heart rhythm and conduction studies: Q9f [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9G
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. Carotid ultrasound studies: Q9g [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9H
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. MRI exam of the brain: Q9h [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD9I
variable.description: [Diagnostic procedures]. Since your last visit to the ARIC clinic, have you had any of the following procedures performed for a medical reason? Please do not include any procedures done for research studies or a fitness program. CAT scan of the brain: Q9i [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD10
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Have you ever had a major head injury? That is, one that resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly, or that led you to see a physician or seek hospital care? Q10 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD11
variable.description: [Blood transfusion]. Have you ever received a blood transfusion? This includes whole or fresh blood or red blood cells, but NOT plasma or an IV without blood. Q11 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD14
variable.description: [Head injuries]. What was the reason for your first transfusion? Q14 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD15A
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your first transfusion: Your own. Q15a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD15B
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your first transfusion: from a blood relative. Q15b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD15C
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your first transfusion: from a non-blood relative. Q15c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD15D
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your first transfusion: from a blood bank. Q15d [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD16A
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your other transfusions: your own. Q16a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD16B
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your other transfusions: from a blood relative. Q16b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD16C
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your other transfusions: from a non-blood relative. Q16c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD16D
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Was the blood for your other transfusions: from a blood bank. Q16d [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD17
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Have you ever received any other blood products, such as clotting factors, white blood cells, platelets or plasma? Q17 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD18
variable.description: [Working/standing]. Does the participant use a wheelchair, crutches, or walker? Q18 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD19
variable.description: [Working/standing]. Does the participant walk with a cane? Q19 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD22
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Code number of person completing this form. Q22 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD10A
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Have you ever had a major head injury? That is, one that resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly, or that led you to see a physician or seek hospital care? Q10. How many times has this happened? Q10a [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD10B
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Have you ever had a major head injury? That is, one that resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly, or that led you to see a physician or seek hospital care? Q10. How many of these head injuries resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly? Q10b [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD10C
variable.description: [Head injuries]. Have you ever had a major head injury? That is, one that resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly, or that led you to see a physician or seek hospital care? Q10. In what year was your last head injury for which you lost consciousness or sought medical care? Q10c [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD12
variable.description: [Head injuries]. How many times have you received a blood transfusion? Q12 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXD13
variable.description: [Head injuries]. How old were you when you had your first transfusion? Q13 [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXDFLAG
variable.description: 1= HHXD form is present [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: HHXDCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Health/Medical History, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Health/Medical History, exam 4]
